credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Figures in Lee of Building with Ocean Beyond, Cullercoats, England
medium: Charcoal, graphite on off-white wove paper.
description:
Recto: Group of figures in the lee of a building, with a railing in the middle distance and a view of the ocean beyond. Written color notations  across bottom margin beside a sketched fisherman's hat.
Verso: Groups of figures and two small framed sketches in graphite.
name: Drawing
